eventDescription: Discover our paddle tournaments and clinics.
location: Av. Zamná Mensajeros de Paz, 97208, Mérida, Yucatán
copyright: ÉPICA ACADEMIA PADEL CLUB © 2025. All rights reserved
welcomeMessage: Welcome to Épica Academia Padel Club, the ultimate destination for padel and pickleball enthusiasts in northern Mérida. With 16 indoor padel courts and 2 indoor pickleball courts, we are the largest club with covered courts in Mexico, boasting top-tier facilities that stand out as the best in the city. Here, excellence is our priority: from our courts designed for players of all levels to the passion and expertise of our coaches, the finest in their field, who will guide you to take your game to the next level. Gather your friends, schedule your match, and experience the Épica difference!
